name: Face to the Fire
description:
Navigate this short story as Jamie, who is forced to face what they fear most. Three possible endings. Which will you choose? Art and script is by me. This project has been made with Ren'Py.

Thank you for downloading this game that has been made for a project! 

Music and SFX Credits:
